DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1/2 , prospective , randomize , double-masked , vehicle control , paired-eye study approximately 16 subject evaluate safety , tolerability efficacy elamipretide 1.0 % topical ophthalmic solution patient FCED present mild moderate corneal edema .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigating Safety , Tolerability , Efficacy Elamipretide Topical Ophthalmic Solution Treatment Fuchs ' Corneal Endothelial Dystrophy ( FCED )
